sentence.Network_en: Without the nicer administration, the enterprise cannot be developed prosperously.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有良好的经营管理, 事业就不会兴旺发达.

sentence.Network_en: On domestic family expenses report to go up tap water, the time passes prosperously.
sentence.Network_cn: 家家用上了电,户户安上了自来水, 日子过得红红火火.

sentence.Network_en: We should try every means to shield our motherland ( from aggressions ) to develop healthily and prosperously.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们应该用一切办法保护祖国 ( 不受外来侵略 ),使之能健康繁荣地发展.
